alert.note: Alert for Cody Foothills; North Big Horn Basin; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Southeast Big Horn Basin; Southwest Big Horn Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 2:34PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Accumulating Snow Monday Through Wednesday... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service in riverton. * WHAT...1 to 3 inches of snow. Higher amounts of 4 to 6 inches of snow in the Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains. Gusty northerly wind of 10 to 20 mph. * WHERE...The Bighorn Basin, Cody Foothills, and Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains. * WHEN...Monday through Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel will be impacted by snow. Slow down, as slick spots are likely with snow covered roads. Visibility will be reduced at times. Some drifting of snow is possible, especially along west to east oriented roads.

area.areaDesc: Cody Foothills; North Big Horn Basin; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Southeast Big Horn Basin; Southwest Big Horn Basin
